title: PinkyPartner
description:
Studies show that you have a 95% chance to succeed in building a new habit with a partner.
And alone - less than 10%.

With PinkyPartner you decide which habit you want to work on, you build a contract in seconds with your partner and in order to follow up on each other, PinkyPartner will notify you when your partner has finished his task.

That way you'll be motivated to keep up your promise and build up that habit.

Plus it's much more fun to do things together!
